page.title: 18RECREATION
page.content: We have found that the most popular hobbies /sports for adults were gardening, walking, reading, knitting and watching television. Swimming and football were fairly popular. Other hobbies mentioned included pigeon racing, sewing, cricket, dominoes, pool/snooker, fishing, visiting safari parks, darts and keeping fit. Shirebrook has recently had a much-awaited leisure centre completed.It has been built next to a dismantled railway embankment and is thus conveniently situated near the village centre. From the outside it resembles an outsize water tank but inside the decor is pleasant and the whole place is well looked after with little signs of vandalism.
